subject: Running jUnit suites from maven
msgSnippet: I have made jUnit 4 test suites and run them with maven from the command line. Is there a readme on how to do this as part of the regular build? Why doesn t
messageBody:
I have made jUnit 4 test suites and run them with maven from the command
line. Is there a readme on how to do this as part of the regular build?
Why doesn't maven run test suites automatically?

Jeff
